div.p: As it became a family business it was a progression into actually making it financially viable and increasing the potential of the business.
As the pressures got greater I least liked it I suppose but when it was carefree it was quite nice. The pressures of authority, well not authority,
the pressures of becoming in charge of others, I suppose, as I progressed up the ladder but the carefree bit when I was on my own was great.
